User manual for e-NDF Akshay Tanna 2022-01-23 Preface Heres a three-minute video that demonstrates the process: Figure 0.1: Short video of our Bookdown workflow. View on YouTube. This document servers as a user manual for the BfN-BRT CITES e-NDF. While information from the relevant guidance document is available using the clickable help files for there relevant step/section/question, this website is intended to serve as a document to assist users with using the functionality of the e-NDF. The workflow for the e-NDF is illustrated below. Tufte.
